statements.statement: select * from TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET order by CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID

select * from TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID = '$CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.CLSKETQUA_ID = '$CLSKETQUA_ID$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.DICHVU_ID = '$DICHVU_ID$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.NHOMDICHVU_ID = '$NHOMDICHVU_ID$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.DONVITINH = '$DONVITINH$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.KETQUA = '$KETQUA$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.KETQUA2 = '$KETQUA2$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.MUCBINHTHUONG = '$MUCBINHTHUONG$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.MUCBINHTHUONGMIN = '$MUCBINHTHUONGMIN$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.MUCBINHTHUONGMAX = '$MUCBINHTHUONGMAX$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.BATTHUONG = '$BATTHUONG$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.THUCHIENBENNGOAI = '$THUCHIENBENNGOAI$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
order by CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID
select * from TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET where TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID = '$value$' order by CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID
select * from TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET where TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID = '$CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID$' order by CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID
statements.insert:
select TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET ( CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID , CLSKETQUA_ID , DICHVU_ID , DVYEUCAU_ID , NHOMDICHVU_ID , DONVITINH , KETQUA , KETQUA2 , MUCBINHTHUONG , MUCBINHTHUONGMIN , MUCBINHTHUONGMAX , BATTHUONG , THUCHIENBENNGOAI , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# , #CLSKETQUA_ID# , #DICHVU_ID# , #DVYEUCAU_ID# , #NHOMDICHVU_ID# , #DONVITINH# , #KETQUA# , #KETQUA2# , #MUCBINHTHUONG# , #MUCBINHTHUONGMIN# , #MUCBINHTHUONGMAX# , #BATTHUONG# , #THUCHIENBENNGOAI# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update: update TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET set CLSKETQUA_ID = #CLSKETQUA_ID# , DICHVU_ID = #DICHVU_ID# , DVYEUCAU_ID = #DVYEUCAU_ID# , NHOMDICHVU_ID = #NHOMDICHVU_ID# , DONVITINH = #DONVITINH# , KETQUA = #KETQUA# , KETQUA2 = #KETQUA2# , MUCBINHTHUONG = #MUCBINHTHUONG# , MUCBINHTHUONGMIN = #MUCBINHTHUONGMIN# , MUCBINHTHUONGMAX = #MUCBINHTHUONGMAX# , BATTHUONG = #BATTHUONG# , THUCHIENBENNGOAI = #THUCHIENBENNGOAI# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID = '$CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID$'
statements.statement:
BEGIN delete from TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET where CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID in
#LST_DEL_CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID[]#
update TT_DVYEUCAU set TRANGTHAI = 'CHUAKETQUA', NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$', NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where DVYEUCAU_ID in
#LST_UPD_DVYEUCAU_ID[]#
END;

delete from TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID = '$CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.CLSKETQUA_ID = '$CLSKETQUA_ID$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.DICHVU_ID = '$DICHVU_ID$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.NHOMDICHVU_ID = '$NHOMDICHVU_ID$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.DONVITINH = '$DONVITINH$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.KETQUA = '$KETQUA$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.KETQUA2 = '$KETQUA2$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.MUCBINHTHUONG = '$MUCBINHTHUONG$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.MUCBINHTHUONGMIN = '$MUCBINHTHUONGMIN$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.MUCBINHTHUONGMAX = '$MUCBINHTHUONGMAX$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.BATTHUONG = '$BATTHUONG$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.THUCHIENBENNGOAI = '$THUCHIENBENNGOAI$'
TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

select c.CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID, c.CLSKETQUA_ID, c.KETQUA, c.DONVITINH, c.BATTHUONG, c.MUCBINHTHUONGMIN, c.MUCBINHTHUONGMAX, c.DICHVU_ID as KQDICHVU_ID, d.* from TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET c left join TT_DVYEUCAU d on d.DVYEUCAU_ID = c.DVYEUCAU_ID
c.CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID = '$CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID$'
c.CLSKETQUA_ID = '$CLSKETQUA_ID$'
c.DICHVU_ID = '$DICHVU_ID$'
c.DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$'
c.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
order by CLSKETQUACHITIET_ID
